story_06_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: So? How do you think they did, Lucario?
story_06_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah, I think so, too!
Lucario seems to have taken a liking to you all.
story_06_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Yeah! Lucario has the ability to sense
the auras that surround people.
story_06_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
He must have sensed how tightly bonded
you all are with your Pokémon!
story_06_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
In fact, I was able to pick up on the same
thing pretty clearly while I was watching
you guys train.
story_06_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
And not just the bonds you have with your
Pokémon, but also the bonds you have with
each other as a team!
story_06_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Be confident! The tighter your bonds get,
the stronger you’ll become!
story_06_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Our bonds... You’re right!
All of us have bonds that connect us.
story_06_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Bonds with our Pokémon and bonds
with our friends and teammates!
story_06_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
If we put all of our effort into strengthening
those bonds, I’m sure we’ll be able to defeat
Trainers like Lear!
story_06_05000/2401_0401_1300_10:
All right! I’m starting to see a little bit of
that confidence shine through!
story_06_05000/2401_0402_1500_10:
Like I said, confidence is key! Looks like you’re
finally starting to see the possibilities, though.
story_06_05000/2401_1001_1600_10:
All right! What do you say we finish this
training session with a battle!
story_06_05000/2401_1001_1800_10:
It’s go time...
Let’s give it all we’ve got!
